titles.title: To authorize the acceptance of endowment contributions for educational and cultural international exchange programs of the Department of State and the designation of such programs in recognition of the contributions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Operations and Human Rights.

bill.summary: 3/14/2000--Introduced. Amends the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 to authorize the Secretary of State to: (1) accept endowment contributions for educational and cultural international exchange programs of the Department of State; and (2) designate such programs in recognition of the endowment contributions if such programs have not been designated by law.
